option.name: VM_PARAMETERS
option.value: -Xmx512m -Xms256m -XX:MaxPermSize=250m -ea

task.summary: -Code changes -using own cards -App.java now contains all constants -All fragments moved to fragment packet -now using PreferencesFragment instead of own SettingsFragment //WIP adding filesizes and other information to backup items

changelist.name: Default
changelist.comment:
Update 2.4.2
-Force close on app-start on some devices fixed -Error on loading Screenshots fixed on low memory devices -Add files to Flash Queue (in Recovery-Script-Manager) fixed for Android 7.1.1 devices (start directory changed to internal memory instead of root)

task.summary: Use local Kernel and Recovery list for debugging instead of updated one
-BackupFragment now on own Activity avoiding UI errors -CM card removed
Rashr now stores information about your devices in the sharedprefs. So Rashr knows without rescanning your device where your partitions are stored (App starts now faster)
fragment_backup_restore.xml moved into activity_backup.xml and BackupRestoreFragment.java moved into BackupActivity.java
new Images added for TWRP devices and Stock Nexus/Pixel devices
Small changes in code style now better to read on some parts

MESSAGE.value: Use local Kernel and Recovery list for debugging instead of updated one
-BackupFragment now on own Activity avoiding UI errors -CM card removed
Rashr now stores information about your devices in the sharedprefs. So Rashr knows without rescanning your device where your partitions are stored (App starts now faster)
fragment_backup_restore.xml moved into activity_backup.xml and BackupRestoreFragment.java moved into BackupActivity.java
new Images added for TWRP devices and Stock Nexus/Pixel devices
Small changes in code style now better to read on some parts

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Small changes in code style now better to read on some parts
